title: Strengthening resilience in volcanic areas (STREVA)

findingsText:
The Strengthening Resilience in Volcanic Areas project (STREVA) is an ambitious project involving multiple partners both in the UK and internationally, who have come together to help to improve our capacity to anticipate, plan for and cope with the consequences of volcanic activity. Our geographical focus areas are in Ecuador, Colombia and the Caribbean, and we have already held a series of successful workshops in Montserrat, Ecuador and St Vincent, with more planned in the near future. 



Do take a look at our website to keep up to date with our progress. Our project is very much live and in progress and we are working on many fronts to realise our ambitions for impact. Communities and Social Services/Policy,Education,Environment,Transport
